overview: In this western, a paroled desperado and his twin, a preacher, wander about the Old West to bring "salvation." The parson begins trying to help a gang leader's niece whose uncle has been forcing parolees to join him or return to prison. Naturally he tries to rope the paroled twin into his gang.
tagline: Thrill Upon Thrill! You'll Long Remember As The Fighting Parson Hits The Trouble Trail In His Greatest Adventure!
title: Fugitive from Sonora
